patterns.name: Digital Circuit Botanica
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, large tropical leaves with electric circuit board veins in neon cyan and magenta, continuous motif, no borders, perfect repeat, bioluminescent glow effects, futuristic botanical forms
patterns.technical_notes: Oversized scale for statement pieces, glowing vein effects

patterns.name: Holographic Fern Matrix
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, delicate fern fronds with holographic data stream overlays, pixelated edges with glitch effects, continuous motif, no borders, perfect repeat, iridescent color shifts, digital botanical texture
patterns.technical_notes: Medium scale for versatile garment applications, requires holographic printing techniques

patterns.name: Bioluminescent Moss Network
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, organic moss texture with embedded LED-like dots, network connection lines between bio-nodes, continuous motif, no borders, perfect repeat, glowing cyan and electric green points
patterns.technical_notes: Small scale intricate pattern, optimal for tech-wear applications

patterns.name: Cyber Bloom Transformation
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, flowering plants morphing into geometric digital forms, gradient transformation from organic to pixelated, continuous motif, no borders, perfect repeat, transformative teal and electric fuchsia color palette
patterns.technical_notes: Large scale morphing design, represents nature-tech evolution theme

patterns.name: Quantum Leaf Circuitry
patterns.prompt: seamless repeating textile pattern, tileable fabric design, translucent botanical leaves with visible internal microchip patterns, quantum particle effects around edges, continuous motif, no borders, perfect repeat, ethereal blue aura with amber highlights
patterns.technical_notes: Medium scale with translucent effects, requires advanced printing for transparency illusion

color_trend_analysis.primary_trend: Transformative Teal (2026 Color of the Year)
